name: Acorn squash
pros: It maintains healthy vision, as it contains generous amounts of vitamin A(beta-carotene converted into vitamin A).
It contains a large quantity of vitamin C (ascorbic acid), benefits the body in many ways, specifically for its power in boosting immunity.
Fiber-rich foods like acorn squash could help prevent stroke, heart disease, diabetes, obesity, and gastrointestinal disorders.
Having a good amount of potassium may help relax blood vessels and arteries, lower the stress in your cardiovascular system.
